FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: and add it to sell list

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Sell food & drink that are out leveled

Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: db.AutoSell["SoulboundLow"]=self:GetText(); sml_inform("Auto sell soulbound item minimum level set to "..db.AutoSell["SoulboundLow"]);

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Manually sold items are automatically entered into sell list

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Only sell grey items, always (overrides sell list)

Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: db.AutoSell["SoulboundHigh"]=self:GetText(); sml_inform("Auto sell soulbound item maximum level set to "..db.AutoSell["SoulboundHigh"]);
db.AutoSell["SoulboundLow"]=self:GetText(); sml_inform("Auto sell soulbound item minimum level set to "..db.AutoSell["SoulboundLow"]);
db.AutoSell["SoulboundHigh"]=self:GetText(); sml_inform("Auto sell soulbound item maximum level set to "..db.AutoSell["SoulboundHigh"]);

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: (Items listed on the exclude list will never be sold)

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: (Items listed on the sell list will always be sold)
